Issue.creator: paperman
Issue.environment: We builded the hole environement with the fabric 1.1 release. Everything else works as expected.
Issue.description: So we got an empty string The problem is the declaration of the class Peer: {color:#cc7832}var {color}Peer = {color:#cc7832}class {color}{color:#cc7832}extends {color}Remote need to be changed into: {color:#cc7832}var {color}Peer = {color:#cc7832}class {color}Peer {color:#cc7832}extends {color}Remote Otherwise the compiler dosen't understand the syntax and the class name will be empty. >
